oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dave Bellamy Job No. 37987
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 2514) for an order placed by Dave Bellamy for 200 two color window cards for a performance of the Kitty Wells Show at Honeywell Memorial Center in Wabash, Indiana on April 9. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
